poem:
Title: "Theatre of the Politic"

Unmasked, the demagogues prowl,
Parading with a smoky eye.
Trump and Johnson, their tones so foul,
Behind the droppings, the gull does fly.

Malign performance on public stage,
Their wares of deception do not tire.
Yet, in this boundless, global cage,
I seek not abhor, but aspire. 

Turn yonder, where decency resides,
And shun this gaudy, vulgar play.
Only truth, in us confides,
In every tomorrow, and today.
